headline: A Christmas Day memory for those less fortunate. | Crisis
alternativeHeadline: A Christmas Day memory for those less fortunate. | Crisis | Alan Ranger Photography
description: Christmas Day memory for those less fortunate.
articleBody: A Christmas Day memory for those less fortunate. | Crisis Give a homeless person the gift of a memory in print this Christmas Day Donate £1.50 to give one person a portrait. Donate as much as you want to provide as many portrait prints as possible Crisis Coventry 25th December 2018. Two of my clients (Chris Shaw and Laura Byrne) previous photographers of the Help-portrait Events in 2017 have very kindly volunteered their Christmas Day to provide portrait/event photos for the Crisis Coventry Christmas Day Event. Last year’s photos very warmly received so help Chris and Laura raise enough money to provide 100+ photos on the 25th Dec 2018. Crisis Christmas Day newsAlan Ranger6 December 2018Alan Ranger Photographyhelp-portrait LinkedIn0 Pinterest0
